title: Greeting a Customer
description: These are polite phrases you can use to say hello to a customer.

conversations.usage: Quickly say hi to a customer.
conversation: I'm fine thanks, how about you?
conversations.title: Hello!

conversations.usage: Say hello to a customer in the morning (use "Good afternoon!" after noon, or "Good evening!" after 6pm)
conversation: Good morning! It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?
conversations.title: Good morning!

conversations.usage: Ask a customer how they are feeling.
conversation: I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
conversations.title: How are you doing?

conversations.usage: Ask how a customer's day is going.
conversation: We had a busy morning, but it's a lot quieter now.
conversations.title: How's it going?

conversations.usage: Say hello to a customer that you know (not a stranger)
conversation: Hi, it's good to see you!
You too! How have you been?
conversations.title: Good to see you!
